Side Effects: Memory issues; potentially flared plantar fasciitis; increased migraine pain after stopping drug
Comments: Did help me sleep but did little for migraine pain it was prescribed for.  Possibly caused my plantar fasciitis to flare up while taking the medication.  Worst was after stopping baclofen because of memory issues I was having I had MUCH worse migraine pain for THREE WEEKS straight (thus far).

Side Effects: My body trembles constantly inside like my cells are jumping within their selves I fall off to sleep I can't make a fist I can't hold my cell phone exchange or anything in my hands I have to lean on something to prop up what I'm trying to hold
Comments: It works great as far as taking away my pain I'm left feeling like a zombie

Side Effects: Sleep paralysis Nightmares death lady in black coming to my bed

Reason: just for a pulled muscle ðŸ˜•
Side Effects: Bad dreams...feeling if fear..sleep paralysis..hard sleeping...drunk like...long sleeping
Comments: Something aint right yall...why my doc give me this for a pulled muscle...reading what you all day...this is minor...couldn't she have just given me a muscle relaxer? Well..I took it anyway..yes it kicked out pain in muscle first day..but..things got scary..This stuff is messing with my head..Im dreaming crazy stuff..horrific stuff...waking up scared..dreaming about dreaming..sleeping so hard that..my body_ hurts when I awake...and it promotes sleep...and I sleep and have drowsinesses throughout the day...only 4 days and I totally stopped taking it...and Im still dreaming and having hard sleep paralysis.This stuff is from satan...somebody tell me what's up...I cannot take this drug..and when I asked my  doctor if it causes drowsiness..she said no! How could she not know this?

Reason: L2 L3 nerve pain and ipsoas pain
Side Effects: Great until today. Causes very entertaining vivid dreams until you get a not so entertaining one (anxiety). Usually puts me right to sleep but today I had a steroid shot in my spine as well as an anesthetic shot in each ipsoas muscle. Must be interacting with the Baclofen. Zooming thoughts_ facebook rants (oh well). Bad headache.
Comments: Only take Baclofen when I twerk my extruded disc fragment into my nerve and I'm waiting for an appointment to get a steroid shot so I don't have any long term use issues. After I stop taking them_ I do feel flu-like and exhausted.

Side Effects: Makes me really sleepy
Comments: Love it

Side Effects: Side effects include increased heart rate_ significant tiredness_ especially after the 2nd pill daily.
Comments: Did not improve the lower back pain after 6 days. Will ask the doctor to switch to another medication.

Side Effects: Couldn't stay away when I first took them. Slurred speech_ crazy thoughts_ emotional_ crying_ anxiousness....Overall I wouldn't recommend it
Comments: I wouldn't recommend to anyone with anxiety issues. Did relieve back pain!!

Side Effects: Retention of water in ankles and feet after 4 years. Became severe. Could not walk more than a few feet at a time and was very painful. Saw 5 specialists. None thought it was the medicby presenting evidence .  30 days later I have recovered greatly and realize it was the baclofen.
Comments: Be your own advocate!! Research. Be heard.

Side Effects: Definitely helped with tight muscles
Comments: Anybody with anxiety issues this would work well.

Side Effects: This drug sent my dad to hospital. He has speech problems. Confusion. Been drowsy for 2 days. Still in hospital.
Comments: I would not recommend this drug to anyone

Side Effects: Weird_ mostly scary dreams_"racing thoughts"_ eyes wake middle of night_ very relaxed/calm but couldn't shut my brain off or sleep. Nor sure if bachoflen as I'm also taking gabapentin/neurotin and other sedating meds. Spasms still occurring lots?? Almost afraid to or not continue- would to see other reviews.
I would have nightmares and weird dreams and wake up crying.And be off balanced worse then I usually am all the next day ans cry and feel depressed.
Sick at the stomache
No side effects but know when i need my next doze balance goes speech slurs
Comments: This medication has been the best for me its reduced stabilizes my postural tremor reduced neuropathic pain helps my balance improves my slurred speech stick with the tiredness your body adjusts after 3 weeks i could never go back to tge suffering i had without these meds they do wear off i just take my next dose

Side Effects: swollen feet
Comments: It got worse the longer I took Baclofen. At first I thought it was caused by something else. That is the reason I took it for so long. Now I will look for an alternative for the MS spasticity.

Side Effects: Facial swelling_ lips_ hands swelling_ slurred speech_ memory loss_ sloppy gait_ worsening of muscle spasms.
Comments: I have currently been and still am on gabapentin_for 10 years_ hydrocodein/acetaminophen. Both big no no's with baclofen. Were it not for my own researching drug interactions because of the wheezing that flared up ( I have cold) I would have never found out what an idiot Dr I have_ who obviously never checked my records before prescribing this drug. I am  livid because of his carelessness !!!

Side Effects: None really.  This medication eased the anxiety and tension caused by withdrawals from Klonopin.  I've had 2 fairly significant withdrawal episodes from benzos...once in late 2012 I took Gabapentin which helped.  The most recent occurrence was three months ago and the Baclofen really helped.

I haven't slept in 3 days it gives me horrible shakes if I don't take it I go through withdrawals I feel emotional vivid dreams I wake up not being able to breathe and I start coughing I can't sleep. I can't stop taking the medication because I go through horrible muscle spasms

Reason: Chest spasms in the pictorial  area
Side Effects: Tiredness but not bad
At first I slept a lot!  That subsided after about two weeks.
Comments: Dosage 10mg x 5 per day.

Side Effects: Initially_ I had weakness in my arms and legs_ however_ that disappeared after a week of using it as directed. I used to have extremely painful muscle tension in my back_ which would cause me to vomit for a minimum of 8 hours. The tension in my back was insane. This medication_ fights off that extreme tension.... However_ the double edged sword that comes with it_ is the fact that although it fights hard to relax my muscles_ some tension won't disappear.... Thus_ this will lead to low level tension and being uncomfortable for days_ rather than hours.
none that I can tell
Comments: Its a lifesaver we started slow with one a night now I'm taking 10mg 11/2 tabs 3 times a day_ 2 at bedtime and one as needed_ I don't know what I would do without it_ for breakthrough pain I have valium but I ran out of baclofen before and it was hell.

Side Effects: My arms and shoulders felt weak.  I felt weird while laying down (as if it was hard to breathe).  I felt tired and had blurred vision.  It seemed like it also worsened the Cervical Dystonia.  [Note:  I took half a pill].
Comments: I was taking this to relieve the muscle pain and tension of Cervical Dystonia (a neurological condition).  However_ it actually made the Dystonia worse so my neurologist and I agreed that it was best for me to stop taking it.

Side Effects: Sleepiness

Drowsy_ and a Chilled body temp. After taking flexeril and zanafex with no marked improvements this has been a wonder drug. Only more effective than baclofen is soma 350mg_ however I live in a state where there is a bad drug problem_ and have been unable to obtain prescription.
Sleepiness_ increased muscle spasms_ urinary urgency

As many others have said_ this actually had the opposite effect of what it was supposed to on me. This actually happens to me all the time - if something says "happens to 1% of people taking it" there's a good chance that thing is going to happen to me. It made my shoulder muscles very tense & also gave me dry mouth. On the upside_ I didn't have to wake up to pee when I took it_ as I usually do.

Reason: muscle spasms in back and knee pain
Side Effects: Made my back muscles tense up and hurt worse than before and makes my jaw hurt and lock up to the point that I can't eat. Still have back spasms didn't help that at all. Also makes me have a lot of pressure in my head.
I have had no side effects at all.
Comments: This drug has been a life saver for me. It stops the spasms.

Side Effects: After one day of taking this crap drug I woke up with a severely sore jaw and hands from clenching both all night long. I finally talked to a second doctor who told me to stop the baclophen as it could be having the opposite effect on me than intended.  So not only did this crap drug not work on my muscle tension which hurts very badly...it added to my muscle pain in my jaw and hands!
Took at bedtime friday_ woke up at NOON on Saturday. Face_ hands SWOLLEN_ very emotional and literally suicidal. Depressed_ cried all day till drug effects wore off_ then back to normal.
Comments: If you become depressed or suicidal_ please stop this drug immediately!!! Get help if you need to until it leaves your system!!

Side Effects: Drowsiness_ unsteady balance and more clumsy gait
Comments: I started on Baclofen to replace Valium_ which gave me a hang over.  The muscle spasms in my legs would last for hours but have somewhat subsided since I started taking Baclofen.  Unfortunately I have developed regular foot cramping in both feet and electric shock sensations in both legs that Baclofen does not seem to help.

Side Effects: Been on this as long as I can remember_ main side effect is tiredness

Anxiety_ digestive problems_ stiffness_ dry peeling skin_ join pain_ burning sensation in skin all over body_ swelling of hands_ arms and legs and feet. Urinary incontanence_  two kidney stones. I think I have all the Rare/Severe side affects.
Comments: I took Baclofen for 10 years_ starting with 60 mg/day. I worked up to that dose under a Dr's guidance. It worked well for muscle spastiscity for about 5 years_ then things started to go bad. At first_ I had such weakness in my legs that I couldn't move_ so I cut back to 40 mg/day. Then stiffness_and anxiety along with incontinance. I had no idea that all this was from the Baclofen! I just thought it was because I was aging. This past May things EXPLODED. I woke up swollen_ (I blamed it on hot weather before) my hands were pink and swollen so much that I can't use my thumbs_ and my fingers are stiff. I cut myself down to 30 mg/day and was working on weaning myself off the stuff_ but things got so bad that at 20 mg/day_ that I just stopped the drug. I felt so awful; anyway_ I can't say I noticed a difference. The left side of my body is more swollen that the right_ and my current Dr. is thinking Lymphedema_ but my symptoms don't add up. I don't have the money to be throughly checked out. I'm currently taking Prilosec because I take 1200 to 1600 mg Advil/day_ and Oxazepam 15 mg at night. Oh_ yeah_ I'm also on 25 mg atenolol for the rapid heart beat from Baclofen. I posted this in case there are others suffering as I am because I've been searching the web without much success. I just wanted others to know they're not the only ones.

Side Effects: I have gotten really loopy_ and emotional. I have insane vivid dreams_ so vivid I wake up hysterical crying and it really doesn't even help the muscle Tension In my back just makes me feel like I need to go to the loony been
headache_ bad foot cramps at night_ decreased inhibition_ loss of balance_ blurry vision
Comments: at first I took full dose (20 mg. 3 times a day) and it made me feel out of it and clumsy but helped migraines stop. At a lower dose (5 to 10 mg. once a day) helps headaches and sleeping but after a week or so I begin to get terrible foot cramps at night and increased headaches when it wore off until I take more. Also blurry vision and loss of inhibition.

Side Effects: Helped tremendously with my flow of urine. I had a weak stream due to spasms and chronic IC. My only concern is that the effects may be waning somewhat but overall has helped a great deal.
I don't remember.
None_ maybe slight somnolence
Was tired in the beginning but that went away in about 2 weeks. Less of an appetite and lost about 5 pounds but that stabilized.
Comments: This has worked extremely well for my muscle rigidity that was caused by the removal of a spinal cord tumor in 2010. I have less pain and can walk longer distances. Its effect started to diminish after about 2 months and my doctor increased my dose from 10 mg 3 times a day to 20 mg 3 times a day_ which he said is the normal dose. I like that I don't gain weight on it and it sure helps me sleep without pain_ and go through the day feeling good.

Side Effects: Worse muscle spasms_ worse neck pain_ terrible anxiety_ increased heart rate_ high blood pressure_ worse right eye pain_ dizziness_ confusion.
NONE!
Comments: This medicine has literally been a life saver for me. Though I am starting to see some breakthrough muscle spasms now_ I see that others are taking much more than me. Will talk to Doc about increasing_ then I think I will be good to go. And believe me when I say it's a lifesaver_ I have not taken any drugs for over 20 years_ so to take this was a big step for me. And I am very sensitive_ so the fact that I did well with it and no side effects is really big.

Side Effects: Ticks and flinched a lot. Got really speedy on it. Had bizarre bonkers dreams. didn't feel i was myself
Comments: it worked incredibly for my tinnitus and i actually functioned well for a week_ but i felt it had too many side affects and too strong to continue_ wish is a shame_ so back in bed a lot with anxiety and tinnitus loud.

Side Effects: None_ Except Pain Relief!
Comments: After taking soma for about 5 years_ and never getting relief my. I found a new doctor and she switched me to Baclofen and it started working right away on everything! WOW....what a relief!!!

Side Effects: Have had no adverse side effects.
Comments: This medication has been a real Godsend for me_I get muscle spasms (charlie horses) every where_ hands feet_ legs and arms and back and in my neck! They are extremely painfull_ and the muscles will just not release and relax when they spasm. With Baclofen the spasms are completely gone_ and for the most part as long as I take it every 8 hours I have no spasms at all!   I take 25mg every 8 hours_ except at 10 PM at night I take 30mg. It also has helped relieve some of my Chronic Pain!

Side Effects: at first it made me drowsy but after about a week I was fine.

Initially I was very tired and almost stopped taking it after a few days because of this.  I then started taking half the recommended dose and ramped up from there over a couple of weeks and the drowsiness was much more tolerable.  I still get tired_ but not nearly as bad as during the first couple of weeks I was on it.
Comments: I love this drug - it has given me my life back!  My severe leg spasms/jerks have mostly cleared up now.  It seems like it took a good month to get the full benefit of being on the drug_ so stay with it if you have muscle spasms/jerks and have been put on Baclofen.

Side Effects: None
Comments: Works great for muscle spasms. Before I started the medication_ I could not stretch my legs without cramps but now I never get them. If I miss a dose I notice cramping in my legs within hours. This med is a life saver.

Side Effects: drowsiness which diminished. No other adverse effects.
Comments: LOVE IT_ LOVE IT. I had been OD'ing on Zanaflex with no relief. Baclofen has been a GODSEND. No effects and gives great relief from the spasms/spasticity associated with multiple sclerosis.

Side Effects: None
Comments: This is the best spasm med out there. The others either make me extremely drowsy or don't work.  I wouldn't be able to function without baclofen. I take 20 mg up to 3 times a day.  Usually_ I take it 2x a day and then take tizanidine at bedtime (makes me drowsy).

Side Effects: No side effects
Comments: This drug has completely eliminated my tension headaches_ and helps me get a full night of sleep. Never wake up feeling groggy like with Skelaxin. Love it!

Side Effects: None
Comments: It worked very well for about a year.  Then I seemed to build a tolerance to it and had to switch to Flexeril.  When that stops working I'll probably go back to Baclofen

Side Effects: headache and nausea if taken on an empty stomach
Comments: I am an addict and alcoholic_ this drug works good to eliminate cravings. I did get serious withdrawl symtoms when quiting cold turkey. I take 100mgs a day. It works well for anxiety too. I also have chronic neck and back pain_ it helps take the edge off.

Side Effects: Just mild drowsiness when I first began
dizziness
Comments: This seems to work better than Flexeril.  I take only as neeeded.

Side Effects: fatigue_ bizarre dreams_ trembling/tremor if I miss a dose_possibly nausea and abdominal pain but I'm not sure if this is related to the drug
Comments: I have noticed that when I increase the dose I get fatigued and very tired but after a couple weeks this side effect goes away.  I have some gastrointestinal problems (nausea and abdominal pain/irritable bowel syndrome and gastroparesis) that may be exacerbated by the baclofen.  If I miss a dose I get trembling and shaking all over almost like I'm shivering but I'm not cold.  Overall the baclofen has been the only drug that remarkably helps my dystonia.  I am better able to walk and I don't need to use my wheelchair as much.  I definitely get more twisting and spasms when it is time for my next dose or if I miss a dose so I know it helps quite a bit.  I took Baclofen for 3 years and stopped to get pregnant.  Now I am taking it again and it has been about a year.  I take 20mg 3 times a day and I have taken as much as 80mg/day without severe side effects.

Side Effects: Only on 5 mg so far and isn't working yet for muscle spasms

Reason: Muscle spasms due to probable MS
Side Effects: Drowsiness when I first started taking it_ but that diminished over about a month.  No side effects at all now.
Comments: Worked very well for controlling muscle spasms/spasticity in my legs and in my arms caused by probable MS. Started out with 10 mg twice a day_ but have had to gradually increase dosage to 30 mg a day.

Side Effects: Sleep disorders. Strange vivid dreams wherein I was "not myself" or in my regular dream state. I'd wake up and think it was having a negative effect on my mind_ so I discontinued it.
Don't take on empty stomach.
Comments: I take 10 mg every 3-1/2 hours. It is as effective as diazepam (valium)_ but w/out the drunk feeling. I know it works because if I donÂ’t take it on time- the spasticity really kicks in quickly. I went through a ton of pills before I found this one and itÂ’s the only thing I need. It has improved the quality of my life.

Side Effects: The only side effect I noticed was that it elevated my mood considerably. I then did some research and found out that it can do this. I am bipolar so it was very noticeable to me.
Comments: It works well for the spasms and actually helps with depression to some degree. I take 30 mgs daily

Side Effects: none
Comments: has iliminated tremors temporarily if drug not taken for 2 days severe tremors come back

Side Effects: none
Comments: has iliminated tremors temporarily if drug not taken for 2 days severe tremors come back

Side Effects: none
Comments: 20 mg 3xday stops spasms in legs. couldn't do without it.

Side Effects: None
Comments: Don't notice anything happining except my RLS went away I'm thankful for that_ would take it for that

Side Effects: Took 1/2 doses 3 times first day_ all okay. Started feeling ill but took it in stride second day. Horrible headache/nausea commenced and continued for two more days. Missed two days of work getting it out of my system/getting back on solid food. I had awful headaches on this med. though it seemd to help my other problems. I was unable to take it.
Comments: It is too bad that I had such a reaction to it since it looked so promising.
The first night I took 10mg I woke up and was seeing gigantic bugs crawling every where the drug did not do anything for my pain or muscle spasms.

Side Effects: None
Comments: Helps relax my muscles and stop spasms

Side Effects: none
Comments: Baclofen relaxes my muscles enough for me to sleep and carry out tasks. I have problems in my right arm and can now do more things than before_ with no side effects. Has been a godsend for me.

Side Effects: worked somewhat well  but after  a  few  days i  started  having  sever  heartburn.  Discontinued  use.
none
Comments: just 5 mg 3x day relieved pain from a back spasm that no other meds_ including narcotics_ could. not enough physicians seem to know about this.  my PM doc is an expert on off-label uses of drugs in small doses.

Side Effects: None
Comments: The only medication that releaved my back pain. Now I don't take any pain medication

Side Effects: none
Excessive sweating_ some stomach irritability
